reviews.review_text:
If you're looking for a picturesque spot with amazing food and cocktails, Nama is the place to be! I visited during their opening event, and the waterfront location took my breath away. The decor is incredibly aesthetic, perfect for clicking pictures.

Bonus points for the live DJ and performances that really set the mood for the evening.

Definitely a place I'd recommend for a chill evening out.

Nama Waterfront in is a culinary gem that offers a harmonious blend of excellent food, refreshing cocktails, and a mesmerizing riverside ambiance. It‚Äôs an ideal destination for those looking to enjoy a memorable dining experience by the water.
The owner is quite helpful and friendly and made sure that we have a great time. Amazing house music, live performances and a very beautiful view added up to a beautiful sundowner experience. Highly highly recommended place in Goa.

Absolutely in love with Nama - Waterfront Eatery & Bar! ‚ù§Ô∏è

The ambiance is stunning, with a spacious seating area and a breathtaking waterfront view that sets the perfect vibe.‚ú®

The food was incredible‚Äîevery dish that came to our table was delightful and everything was bursting with flavor.üç°
